metadata.author: Disney
metadata.description:
Ariel, the fun-loving and mischievous mermaid, is enchanted with all things human. Disregarding her fathers order to stay away from the world above sea, she swims to the surface, and in a raging storm, rescues the Prince of her dreams. 

Determined to be human, she strikes a bargain with the sea witch Ursula and trades her fins for legs. With her best friends Flounder and Sebastian at her side, Ariel tries to win the princes love and save her fathers kingdom.

translation.web_share_player_download_app_tip_deskto: Download the free Yoto App and scan this code
translation.web_share_player_download_app_tip_generi: Unlock a world of stories, music, activities, sleep sounds, podcasts and radio

translation.web_share_player_download_app_title_add_: Want to add this card to your Yoto library?
translation.web_share_player_invalid_link_desc: It might contain a typo or is no longer available.
translation.web_share_player_link_preview_descriptio: Listen and add to your Yoto library
translation.web_share_player_not_found_heading: Uh oh, Ive got a bad feeling about this...
translation.web_share_player_not_found_text: We cant find the content youre looking for. You might have followed an expired or invalid link.
translation.web_share_player_sharing_paused_desc: Weve frozen this link because it may be breaking our <1>sharing policy</1>. The playlists creator can email hello@yotoplay.com to request a manual review.

translation.web_share_player_not_found_heading: Ae, ae, ae a, on ne lavait pas prvu !
translation.web_share_player_not_found_text: Nous ne trouvons pas le contenu audio que vous cherchez. Vous avez peut-tre ouvert un lien invalide ou un lien expir.
translation.web_share_player_sharing_paused_desc: Nous avons gel ce lien car il pourrait enfreindre notre <1>politique de partage<\/1>. Le crateur du contenu peut nous contacter sur bonjour@yotoplay.com pour revoir le contenu.
